00022 /**
00023  * @file   IntensityReader.h
00024  * @author Chuck Sugnet
00025  * @date   Mon Oct 24 09:02:16 2005
00026  * 
00027  * @brief Interface for an object that reads data from disk into memory.
00028  */
00029 #ifndef _INTENSITYREADER_H_
00030 #define _INTENSITYREADER_H_
00031 
00032 //
00033 #include "chipstream/ChipStream.h"
00034 #include "chipstream/IntensityMart.h"
00035 //
00036 #include <cstring>
00037 #include <string>
00038 #include <vector>
00039 //
00040 
00041 /**
00042  *  Abstract base class for a class that read files and fills in memory
00043  * representation and chip stream objects that need initialization.
00044  * 
00045  */
00046 class IntensityReader {
00047 
00048 public:
00049 
00050   /** 
00051    * @brief Virtual destructor for a virtual class.
00052    */
00053   virtual ~IntensityReader() {}
00054 
00055   /** 
00056    * Set the names of the files to read data from.
00057    * @param fileNames - vector of file names to be opened.
00058    */
00059   void setFiles(const std::vector<std::string> &fileNames) {
00060     m_FileNames = fileNames;
00061   }
00062 
00063   /** 
00064    * return list of file names registered with the reader
00065    */
00066   std::vector<std::string> getFiles() {
00067     return m_FileNames;
00068   }
00069 
00070   /** 
00071    * @brief Push this chip stream onto the collection that will
00072    * receive data.
00073    * @param stream - Stream to be registered.
00074    */
00075   void registerStream(ChipStream *stream) {
00076     m_Streams.push_back(stream);
00077   }
00078 
00079   /** 
00080    * @brief Push an intensity mart onto the list of those that should
00081    * receive data.
00082    * @param iMart - intensity mart to be put on the list.
00083    */
00084   void registerIntensityMart(IntensityMart *iMart) {
00085     m_IntenMarts.push_back(iMart);
00086   }
00087 
00088   /** 
00089    * @brief Do the heavy lifting of reading data from the cel files
00090    * and passing to all the streams and intensity marts.
00091    * @return true on success or false on error.
00092    */
00093   virtual bool readFiles() = 0;
00094 
00095 protected:
00096   /// Files that are being used.
00097   std::vector<std::string> m_FileNames;
00098   /// Streams we are initializing
00099   std::vector<ChipStream *> m_Streams;
00100   /// Intensity Marts we are initializing
00101   std::vector<IntensityMart *> m_IntenMarts;
00102 
00103   std::vector<double> m_Saturation;
00104 
00105 };
00106 
00107 #endif /* _INTENSITYREADER_H_ */
